definitions: The act of making something flat or even.
The act of bringing something to a horizontal position.
The act of destroying or knocking down a building or structure.
The act of making something equal or uniform.
The act of aiming a weapon.
examples: The construction crew is leveling the ground for the new building.
He was leveling the playing field for all participants.
The storm was leveling trees in its path.
She was leveling her gaze at the speaker.
The company is leveling up its customer service.
